segments.text: Peter , go and tidy up your toys now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm mad ! I said now ! Turn off the TV , and do it now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mom , just ten more minutes . The show is going to be over soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Peter , if you don't do it soon , I will throw your toys in the trash can .
segments.speaker: S1
